title: Man charged in shooting deaths of his sister-in-law and her daughter in N.H.
author: Madison Lucchesi
bullets: Crime Charles "Chuck" Readey, 73, is facing two counts of second-degree murder.
A 73-year-old man was charged Tuesday following the shooting deaths of his sister-in-law and her daughter in Bath, New Hampshire.
Local police responded to a report of shots fired at 11 Tyler Way around 1:15 p.

title: Town of Burlington overwhelmingly condemns ‘inhumane’ conditions at ICE facility
author: Ross Cristantiello
bullets: Local News Burlington leaders say that ICE is violating local zoning bylaws and keeping migrants detained in poor conditions for long periods of time.

title: NFL analyst breaks down Christian Gonzalez’s role in stopping Josh Allen with the game on the line
author: Khari A. Thompson
bullets: New England Patriots "Gonzalez has got his hands on him, he's in perfect position between the man and the ball, and he makes sure that Coleman is out of bounds.

title: Wu to ‘headline’ major anti-Trump protest in Boston
author: Ross Cristantiello

title: Alleged Mass. YMCA voyeur facing 21 new charges
author: Beth Treffeisen
bullets: Crime The Brockton man previously pled guilty to similar charges and remains incarcerated.
The East Bridgewater Police Department is filing 21 additional charges against a Brockton man accused of photographing women and children in the shower at the local YMCA.
Abidan Rivera, 43, pleaded guilty in May to taking photos of a woman in a YMCA shower and is incarcerated at the Plymouth County Correctional Facility.
